Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are bringing attention to the struggles faced by Australians on government welfare payments. Over one million people including students caregivers single parents and people with disabilities are experiencing financial destitution. The majority of JobSeeker allowance recipients face severe financial distress with many unable to afford basic necessities like food medication or housing. Advocates suggest raising the payment rate to at least $76 per day to alleviate these concerns.
